name: PandaDoc
description: Integrate with PandaDoc to list, create, send and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Documents
tools.description: List documents in PandaDoc. Filter by status, search query, or date range. Returns document names, statuses, and IDs.

tools.name: Create Document
tools.description: Create a new document in PandaDoc from a template. Specify recipients, tokens, and metadata.

tools.name: Send Document
tools.description: Send a PandaDoc document to its recipients for viewing or signing. The document must be in draft status.

tools.name: Get Document
tools.description: Get detailed information about a PandaDoc document by its ID. Returns name, status, recipients, and field values.

tools.name: List Templates
tools.description: List available PandaDoc templates. Returns template names, IDs, and creation dates.
